name: Vampire Hunter 2
overview: You play Adam, the Vampire Hunter, who tries to foil the evil plot set by Astaroth – brother of the defeated evil vampire, Mozgorioth. Astaroth flys to New York city, and pours a deadly poison into the sewers – hoping civilians in such a state will perish. Don’t play this horror themed game before going to sleep. You’ll have nightmares! Released as part of the SEUCK Compo 2014, and published in Commodore Free #080.
